Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Like I also replied to you on Twitter; these are just previews and not representative of the final game. Any stats are just placeholders at the moment too, the picture is mainly to showcase the different classes discussed in the update.  The class icons are in the circles next to the Health bars, and the Tank one you were looking for is indeed the Shield like you suggested after. Healer is the '+' icon, a common sign for First Aid, Medics or for example the World of Warcraft Healer icon if we are staying within the RPG scene. We don't want to be excessively creative with this; we want to use symbols that are commonly used in both real life and gaming so people instantly recognise them.  Our main aim at this moment in time is to create a playable beta version of the new RPG-style game for our community to test, which means small cosmetic changes are quite far down the priority list. We'll take your feedback into account for future reference though, and combined with/depending on other community feedback we receive we may or may not make certain changes.

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: I've addressed a lot of your points after your messages in Telegram, so for the sake of completeness I'll copy that here:  Quote Thanks for the feedback! This is only the first iteration of the tutorial, and we'll be updating it if and when necessary along with the rest of the game. This plus community feedback helps us decide the next steps in the dev process. We are looking at ways of preventing future cluttering though.  This leads me to the next point, which is our dev plans for the near future! We are rolling out a new build this coming week to push through some bug fixes and improvements. Once this is complete, we will be working on UI/UX and gameplay improvements (which includes looking at game flow and shields).

Android has historically been more lenient, but with Apple featuring our game in their store we are hopeful that we can start slowly edging our way in through this connection.

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Just as an update on the spell clamping from the devs: Quote We do matchmaking using Creature level. But what we realised pretty quickly was that if a really experience player starts playing with a new creature (Level 1), then they will still be way overpowered because their spells will already be at high levels.  So what was implemented is that the spells get clamped to your Creature level.  This was implemented a while ago, and spell level/creature level was quite closely correlated. Recently though, more ways of getting portals have been added, so the spells are overtaking the creatures and getting clamped even at max creature level. It's something we hadn't given much thought, so thanks for bringing it to our attention! We'll work on a different system of making sure people dont get discouraged by stronger veterans of the game, while keeping it fair for everyone.

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Just to clear up any confusion;  A coin's marketcap and its rank in the list on CMC is decided by 2 factors: Its current price Its circulating supply The marketcap and subsequent rank is simply calculated by multiplying the price per coin x its circulating supply. Since the DTB supply is fixed at ~23 Million, only fluctuations in price will have an effect on the CMC ranking. However as DTB orderbooks are thin, the price is prone to fluctuations, and therefore also prone to big moves in marketcap and rank as demonstrated by the recent rank jumps in both directions.

As always, feel free to leave feedback, ask questions, or join our Discord for a chat! #KeepBattling!  Glad you liked it. Unfortunately, someone took our microphone right before the Meetup and I had to go run and buy a $10 one. We're still trying to improve our set-up; our non-Meetup broadcasts generally have better sound, as we're all at home.  Sorry for talking shit about Apple, but I was an early BCY hodler who remember their original plan to use cryptocurrency in Spells of Genesis. We have nothing against you game developers, and we understand your need to maintain cordial relationships with the powers that be. We will try not to jeopardize that as we channel community frustrations.  When it comes to dedicated Meetups focused on one particular game, we have so far reserved that for instances where someone from the team can come visit Vancouver in-person. We are always open to ideas, though, and are planning a couple of conferences. Feel free to PM me if you are interested in doing something, or else maybe I'll send you guys a reminder when our conference plans are finalized.

(Nope... No way was i "ready")  BATTLE. So, from the tutorial, i know what spells are meant to do.  But then i see 2 RELICS.  .... Author: The Bitcoin Co-op
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: I just started playing and I have a couple questions:  1.  Where are my blockchain creature tokens managed? For example, Spells of Genesis uses the Book of Orbs app for that. I want to see them on a list where I can send them to other addresses if I want 2.  What is the use of AR in the game? I couldn't see anything interesting when I enabled it, so I've been playing without

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hey, thanks for playing! As for your questions: 1. Currently the creatures are not tokenized yet; this is something that is part of our plans for Q1 of 2019. Our partner Nona, who handles all our blockchain integration, is working on an online Portal where you can manage all assets. This will be bound to your game account, and will allow you to exchange DTB, manage your creatures and trade/sell them once the auction house is complete. We'll release the Q1 and Q2 roadmap this week, which will provide a rough timeline. 2. AR doesn't provide in-game benefits as such, it is more of a cosmetic addition. Some people enjoy having the creatures in the environment around them and taking cool screenshots, while other prefer to just focus on battling with no distractions. We're running a screenshot competition at the moment, and AR can make for some great shots.  I hope that provides the info you were after, but feel free to ask about anything else you may want to know!

Author: The Bitcoin Co-op
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Thanks for answering! I just put Augmentors next to Spells of Genesis on my phone, and am looking forward to the blockchain integration. I'll be sure to talk about it on our news broadcast for www.blockchaingaming.com  Another question: are you guys considering the implementation of GPS tracking, or some other method of making creatures appear randomly in the world for us to find and capture using AR? Like Pokémon Go, except on the blockchain where it actually matters.

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Awesome, thanks very much  I don't think a GPS based system has been considered yet, at least not to a too serious extent. With the limited amount of creatures currently available, and the max supply per creature I think the density of creatures would be too low at the moment. It is maybe something we could consider for the future, perhaps have it centred around known player locations. Once more creatures have been added this may be more feasible, but we'd be looking at distant future. We still have a lot we want to implement before then, so I'm just brainstorming a bit here. It is a great suggestion though and would make a super cool addition!

Author: The Bitcoin Co-op
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: I think you guys need to make the multiplayer less prone to lag/disconnect or else adjust the rules. It's understandable that it should be kind of glitchy at an early stage, but because we bet gold on a match, these glitches are expensive. I have lost count of the number of times that I was about to win a high-stakes match when it suddenly froze and simply took my wager instead. I'm guessing it took my opponent's wager, too.  The result for me has been that I usually don't play Augmentors unless I'm certain to have perfect network conditions, which often excludes during public transit. Or I only play tier 0. There's little consequence if I get disconnected while playing Spells of Genesis, by comparison, so now I save my SoG action points for when Augmentors won't work, like more remote areas and certain tunnels

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Thanks, that's a good point that others have raised too, and warrants change. We want to make sure people don't dodge players they don't want to fight, which is an issue we had in the past, but we also don't want to penalise players whose connection genuinely drops like in the examples you provided. We'll look into finding a fair solution, and update accordingly! My apologies for the slow response, I have been and still am on holiday, but I'll try to respond as soon as possible.

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Thanks, sorry for anything that wasn't clear!  All stats are the creature's stats before any skill points have been put into them; Health is indeed its starting Health/Hit Points. The Mana stat shows how long it takes for the creature to regenerate one point of mana during battles (in this case 2.1 seconds per Mana point). Mana is required to cast spells. Defense means the creature's special shield (each creature has 1 special shield and 1 special attack, outside of the card deck you can build) Attack same as above.  We'll have a look at the wording on the tips (e.g. Equipment vs Relic), and adding some more. It was a recent addition so there is still lots of scope for alterations.  With regards to the ERC20 swap, we are still looking at Q1 2019. We have been in contact with Bittrex and they are fully supportive, so we are working on ironing out the process and getting things set up. Once we get Christmas/holidays out of the way and closer to the time I can provide a better timeframe

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: I can elaborate on this a bit! You will indeed be able to use DTB in the online Portal, either to buy creatures directly or to exchange them for Emeralds with which you then buy creatures, that is still being worked on. The Augmentors universe will be two-fold, with the game itself being one part and the online Portal the other. The online Portal will host everything blockchain related, like creatures and Databits and associated transactions. This split is currently necessary as LordAltcoin says, because anything crypto related (and especially crypto transactions) is extremely difficult if not impossible to get in app stores. It is a clever solution that allows for The Portal and Game to be linked, but not in a way that interferes with any terms and conditions.

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hey guys,  I would like to elaborate a bit on this week's Medium update!  Patches First of all, we have decided to release a new patch for the game every 2 weeks rather than 4, to make sure we can be quicker when it comes to improvements and implementing feedback ideas. I'm sure you'll agree that this is best at this stage of the game, where we are still working towards a full launch and relying on community feedback to improve and adapt, on top of adding the new features we have got planned already.  Apple As you can read in the update, Apple have been in touch with Augmentors! We are happy to say that they are looking to feature the game, as they are very interested in AR and its possibilities. They have dedicated 2 support teams to this cause, and are looking to help us with gameplay, UI and monetization. We are hugely excited by this, and we are currently working on addressing the feedback raised by them. Going forward, we will look to use their expertise to help us create the best possible game.  We have had some great feedback from the community on our latest patch, and with the updated spells and VFX we will be looking to add more supported devices to our list! . Needless to say, we are increasingly optimistic for the future, and as always will continue to work hard with great passion and dedication.  Keep Battling!

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Thanks for your comments, some good points in there.  We absolutely listen to the community, and a lot of changes are driven just because of this. The UI changes were amongst those, and the feedback on them has been overwhelmingly positive. I dont think a small price drop in very thin orderbooks is a good indicator of the reception of this particular update, when there have been bigger moves on no news. We have only been live in App Stores for 2 months now, and already we've had multiple updates. We've also recently changed our update schedule to once every 2 weeks to better adapt to community feedback, and on top of that are constantly working on new features. Even though we have a small team, they are incredibly passionate and work very hard, but as I have said before you can't overhaul things completely overnight. With regards to engaging the crypto community; that is why I am here, and why I have started posting in this thread regularly.  I've already touched on promotion in a few previous posts, but some new points were raised. After the soft launch, we've had a good few articles and interviews posted in South African media, as per our plans. Promotion after soft launch was always going to be centred around the country we launched in. In early 2019, we will be looking to soft launch in more countries (EU included), which will be accompanied by promotion in their respective media outlets. As we work towards a full launch and worldwide release, promotion will also commence on a larger scale.  I like your idea of offering a reward for people to download the game, leave a review etc. I've added it to our list of ideas!

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Thanks for sharing some more views!  The deck overview (on the left) is a simplified version of the full cards (on the right), where the representation is fairly simple and as follows: Card Name, Attack/Shield Power, Mana Cost. There is a clear distinction between Attacks and Shields; Attack Power is red, and Shield Power is grey. With regards to the 's' (I assume you are referring to the creature stat x s/mana), that stands for seconds, which means the creature will regenerate a mana point every x seconds.  Creature grouping could be looked in to, but since each creature will be unique as NFTs (down to their relics and win/loss ratio), it may not be the best solution. We'll look into some possibilities to reduce cluttering!  With regards to DTB; I have touched on this in a few of my previous posts here, and it has been part of our weekly Medium updates too, so I'll try not to repeat myself too much. In short, our partner Nona is working on the blockchain integration, and once that is complete you'll be able to send your DTB to the online Portal and exchange them for game assets!

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hey Sammy, thanks for your contribution. If you have a minute, you can read the Q4 plan, which goes into the details of the blockchain integration happening this quarter, which includes creature swaps and tokenisation, and ability to use DTB in the game.  Vinny invested for 20% of the business, and while he is not personally involved in the game or the day to day proceedings of Augmentors, his company has provided invaluable connections, people and ideas. Regardless of your opinion of him, without him Augmentors may not even have been here. As for app stores, if you want an app that is globally available then this is unfortunately the way things are at this moment in time, until a better alternative presents itself.  In the past year and 8 months since the ICO, we have been working hard to cater to both gamers and investors alike, and now that we have the foundation of the game up and running we can work on the blockchain aspect of it. Rome wasn't built in a day, and neither is a full game. The team is still small, but works incredibly hard every day on producing the best possible merger between AR, blockchain and gaming. Augmentors are pioneers in this, and it doesn't happen overnight. We get one shot at this, as one of the first, and we want to make sure everything is 100%.

Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hey KawaBunGa,  I cant answer 1. because this depends on your phone, but it should be a case of closing it, like you would with any app, please join our Discord channel for further assistance.  2. We are (and have been for a while) working on finalising the creature swap.  Originally the tokens were XCP based, but we decided that ERC is a better option for gaming tokens, im sure most of you will agree.   So we are working on enabling a token swap for ICO creature tokens to the new ERC-721 format as well as the creature token, Databits tokens will likely move over to ERC also, this would be another "token" swap also. We have been and are in full contact with Bittrex  who are aware of our plans and told us they will happily handle any future swpa as needed.  We will make sure everything goes as smoothly as possible and out top priority is to make sure no one has any risk of losing tokens. There are quite a few "moving parts" but all is coming along nicely, ETA for Tokens swap, as per roadmap is Q4 , which we are into so hope to keep to this timeframe.  As people know, we have just wrapped up a very enjoyable and very important 3 day event at  Comic Con.  We were very lucky with out timing as it could not have worked out better, being able to soft launch Augmentors at such a big event, was a real blessing.  We have met with a lot of gaming influencers and had several interviews with gaming related websites and spoke with representatives from gaming companies.  The comments from people, general public and professional people where very positive, they love how we are using Augmented Reality, they spoke abut a lack of quality and how we have put the "magic ingredient" into the recipe. We made many more contact who in the future will help us promote and reach new people in the industry.  Promotion.  We have plans and from the last 3 days, we now have even better and bigger plans for promoting Augmentors going forward, i would just like to add, in Soft Launch, this is a time for data collecting, we will be analysing all feedback and data to fine tune Augmentors Game and have it hit the ground running come full launch.  Once we are ready for full launch, then you will see a big push in promotion, we will reveal much more detail when the time comes.  For now, please enjoy these photo from Comic Con and rest assured, we have a professional team in the game design, creation and also marketing. It takes a lot of careful planning and execution, so i hope everyone here understands, that everything will happen when the time is right. Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hello,   We have been asked this from our supporters on Telegram and on Discord also.  We have a brief post here on medium that gives a little insight into the promotion plans, but we can say, we are saving "The Best" for full game launch.  https://medium.com/augmentors/what-exactly-is-a-soft-launch-and-how-are-we-approaching-it-e22d69cdd3a0  During this time we are building a strong network of people , mostly gaming influencers, article writers, You Tube creators and people from the community to give Augmentors Game a huge boost in awareness come full launch.  We only get "one Shot" at this, so we want to make sure everything is in place and the game ticks all the right boxes.  We gained a lot of valuable feedback from pro Gamers at Comic Con, we  see there are areas where the game needs big improvement and we are working to change what is needed to make sure of the following.  1. Game is addictive. Yes, its no secret, we want players to be addicted to Augmentors Game.  2. Game is profitable. Yes, such is life, everything we do costs money, from rent to staff to events. *Note we are also making sure, there is next to "zero" pay to win incentive, we want organic income.  3. Game is suitable to mobile gaming esports events. If we master points 1 and 2 above, then 3 should be a no brainer.

Body: Vinny Lingham-backed blockchain AR game launched in South Africa Augmentors, a blockchain-based augmented reality game for Android and iOS, has soft-launched in South Africa. Developed in South Africa, two of the game’s co-founders appeared on Shark Tank South Africa in 2016 where they secured an investment in Bitcoin from Vinny Lingham.  https://mybroadband.co.za/news/gaming/277219-vinny-lingham-backed-blockchain-ar-game-launched-in-south-africa.html   The first ever deal on Shark Tank that was done in Bitcoin, was AugmentorsGame - see how far they have come in the past 2 years. Congrats to the team for some solid execution and an exciting game! https://twitter.com/VinnyLingham/status/1046412037146836992

Author: mamoto
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hi all, please note that there will be some downtime this week for scheduled maintenance. The expected maintenance window will be around 4 hours, after this Apple users will be able to continue to play the previous version until the updated version is live on the App Store. Android users will need to download the latest version in order to continue playing, it may take up to 36 hours for the new version to be available on the Play Store.  Please expect the scheduled downtime to begin at 8 am UTC, 4 October. Apple players will be able to start playing again from 12:00 pm UTC, 4 October. Android users will be able to download the new version and start playing by 15:00 pm UTC, 5 October the latest.  We will keep you updated.  The most notable update affects the way your account is secured. In the past, if you re-installed the app on Android, a new account would have been created for you. Now, your account will be secured by your device ID, so if you delete and reinstall the app all of your info will be saved.  You can find all of the release notes for this new version on our website, here  https://www.augmentorsgame.com/release-notes. Please let us know if you have any issues with your account.

Author: drays
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: I have read the creatures and Databits are going to migrate from XCP to Etherreum (ERC-20/721).  But the game already exists and I assume DTB and creatures can be used there.  So I am a bit confused - the DTB and creatures used currently in the game - where are they stored now? Are they now on Bitcoin blockchain (XCP), or on Ethereum (ERC)..? Or maybe they are not on any blockchain currently, and are just issued voluntarily inside the game!? In that case how the DTB supply is going to be controlled?

Author: AugmentPhil
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Good questions, thanks for asking!  So currently, the game is indeed live, but DTB and tokenized creatures can not yet be used there (you can battle with creatures, they are just not tokenized yet). As per the roadmap for Q4, this integration and the swap will happen this quarter, and until then everything is still on the BTC chain. People who have got creature tokens obtained in the ICO will be able to then trade them for actual creatures, if they so desire. I can highly recommend reading the high-level development update for this coming quarter for some more in-depth explanation.  The DTB supply of around 22M is fixed, that is not going to change. For every 1000 Emeralds circulating in the game, Augmentors will buy 1 DTB from secondary markets, and hold this in a wallet dedicated to maintaining this ratio. If you obtain Emeralds in the game (through whatever means), you will also be able to change those back into Databits and sell them, and the 'ratio-wallet' will be updated accordingly. There is an economic whitepaper that goes into all the details of how the game will provide value to DTB, you can find it here  I hope these were the answers you were looking for, feel free to ask any more you may have.

Body: Hello Everyone,  A reminder to check out our White Paper, it is updated with the new game economy from May this year.     We will be updating it again during the Soft Launch period as we edit and enhance our game economy and other areas that require improvement or adjusting due to the Soft launch feedback and statistics.   https://www.augmentorsgame.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/25052018-DatabitsWhitepaper-v2.1.2.pdf  a lot of the questions you may have will be answered here and also, please make sure to join our Discord server, the main place to get the latest news from our team.  https://discordapp.com/invite/rStv26P  As i have mentioned previously, this is a life long passion, not only for myself but for all of the team, since we launched the game in January last year, we have grown and formed a Team Spirit that is so inspiring and helps us drive forward and produce the game that you will soon see (from the people who have access to the soft launch). The Augmented Reality space and the mobile gaming world is constantly changing, we evolve and change with the times and we always will, keeping our game looknig fresh and feeling good.  There has been no shortcuts, no "that will do" attitude, everything we do gets checked over, time and again, to make sure it is the best we can deliver and i think the people will agree come full launch.   We hope to see members of the Crypto community at Comic Con South Africa and if you can not make the trip over here, then we have plans to attend more conferences, but for now, all hands on deck,  full focus on the soft launch and Comic Con.  We hope you enjoy our trailer which we will be putting to good use to spread the word and promote our game. Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hello Everyone,  Let me try and clear up the little confusion here.  Lets start with the mention of Delays.   Really we have only had delays with the creatures tokens and that is due to the change in platform, no longer will Counterparty be used (as originally planned) for Creatures, but we will now move to ERC 721 token for creatures, so understandably, there is a delay here due to the change in networks, all of which, is coming along nicely, these things do take time and it is of the utmost importance we get everything right before releasing the creature tokens, the security and protection of our investors is of the highest importance and we wont release anything until we know its a secure as possible.  Now there was going to be another testing round in Q2 that we pushed back to the start of Q3 mainly due to the feedback and there is now alternative way, much improved ways we can develop the game.   This is another reason for delays, we work hard daily and sometimes something comes along, that can help us do something is a much better way, either in the graphics department, speed of developments or another reason. We have done work and simply had to scrap it to move to the more advanced way of creating our mobile game.    We decided, through a lot and i mean a lot of studies that a soft launch approach would be much more beneficial to our game.   Please see here for a good explanation of a Soft Launch.  http://smallbusiness.chron.com/soft-launch-vs-hard-launch-24486.html  Again, this is being done to help make the game as fine tuned and of the highest quality possible before mass release, soft launches are very common in this space these days and will help the finish the final version of the game for Hard Launch.   So, i hope you can all understand the choices we make, we dont make these choices lightly and everything we do is for the best interests of the game, afterall we all want to release and see the best game possible and that is exactly what we strive for, every day here at Augmentors HQ.  So please give us a little leeway as we progres, i think we are doing well considering we are developing a game in new uncharted waters, AR is still in its infancy we have great timing in creating a game of high quality when there is little competition around.  We thank you for your patience and hope to see you all in the Telegram and Discord channels.  PS: Everyone who has signed up for testing, please make sure to check your email from us, there will be little extras for those who have signed up.

Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: For anyone here that might of missed it......   We will Soft Launch Augmentors at Comic Con South Africa!  https://www.comicconafrica.co.za/en.html   So that Soft Launch ready in just over 1.5 years, incredible feat for a small team, producing a first class game.  A lot is happening, so please stay up to date via our Medium Blog posts (weekly) and Telegram and Discord channels.  Many thanks.  https://medium.com/augmentors/augmentors-is-coming-to-comic-con-africa-community-update-13-july-2018-42c152cc5f6b  Augmentors is launching at Comic Con Africa! Community update, 13 July 2018. Hey guys!  We’re so excited to let you know that we’re going to be at Comic Con Africa in September! It’s the first time Comic Con has come to Africa so it’s also the perfect place to soft-launch our game, don’t you think? Check out all the details below.  COMIC CON AFRICA  From the 14th to the 16th of September, the team behind the Augmentors Game will be at Comic Con Africa, transporting all our visitors to a new realm of mobile gaming.  Visitors will be able to download the game straight from the exhibition booth, as well as from the respective app stores. There will be ongoing battle competitions for those who want to play the game at the booth, with some epic Augmentors swag up for grabs for those who dominate their opponents.   We’ll also be running a number of competitions to giveaway tickets to attend Comic Con Africa (even for Saturday which is already sold-out!). So you’ll need to stay tuned to Discord and Twitter for details on these.  Comic Con Africa is the best place to soft-launch Augmentors, so from the middle of September, Augmentors will be live! While we’ll be soft-launching in South Africa first, and then select countries a few weeks later, you, our awesome community, will be able to play wherever you are in the world! So hold on tight, in just a few weeks you’ll be able to get a sneak peak during Alpha and then in a few short months you’ll be able to get lost in the Bello Realm.  ALPHA IS COMING IN LESS THAN 20 DAYS!  Alpha is just around the corner and we’ll be battling in just less than 20 days. For those who haven’t yet, make sure you sign up and get ready to battle from August 1st.  Alpha will run from August 1st to August 7th, we’ll have a post on all the details on Alpha in our Community Update on the 27th of July — so make sure you keep an eye on our channels for all the juicy details!  To whet your appetite, have a look at this awesome video of some brand-new in-game battle footage!   Augmentors Battle NEW CREATURE REVEALS  The 5 new creatures that will be available in Alpha are being revealed on Discord in a throwback game of #CreatureHangman! The second new creature, Hydrastia (below), was revealed last week after our community correctly guessed her name. Hydrastia, sorceress from the depths of the Wetlands, came to the aid of the Augmentors once she learnt of Rhule’s return. Her main source of strength comes from her coral reef scepter, allowing her to summon some of the most unique water spells the Bello Realm has ever known.   Hydrastia The third creature has been unveiled on discord during this week’s #CreatureHangman, if you want to be one of the first to check him out head over to Discord and our dedicated #CreatureHangman channel today. Be sure to check out the weekly game of #CreatureHangman.  Join us on our official Discord server, Telegram and Twitter!  #KeepBattling!  About Augmentors  Fore more information on Augmentors and to sign up for Alpha visit https://www.augmentorsgame.com/, read the Databits Economy Design and join us on Telegram, Discord and Twitter.

Author: VintageBazaar
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: UPDATE: Testing is going well, lots of fantastic feedback being given. I wanted to post some screenshots here for those who only come here to find news about game.  Screen Shots from Testing.  This is a stunning old castle in Bonnie Scotland Here we see Markik and  Ki in action.    A little about the screen.  Starting from top left and working clockwise.  1- Gold round symbol is your player profile icon. 2 - your name and country flag (fixed in new update as it was only showing SA before) 3 - Red health (316) Blue Mana points (needed to cast spells, bottom right) 4- Shield power 5 Timer (below timer setting and AR) never used these yet. 6- other players stats and showing what card / spell is used "Water Bomb".  Bottom right we have the spells, your cards and it also shows what card it next. If you hold the card on screen it pops up in middle of screen to give you the stats, EG: how much Attack or Defense it has.  8 - 4 cards at any one time, plus the 5th "next card" showing. 9- Bottom left, your Relics! Use and choose these wisely. You get 2 to select for your creature.  Cards / spells need mana to use, 10 is the maximum mana you can get, so a lot of strategy has to go into when to use the card types.  Second stunning screenshot from Loch Ness... can you spot "Nessy?"     Stay tuned for screen shots of the UI. Back to Battle i go!

Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hello Everyone,  A Big Update to bring you.  On Thursday we "Ninja Launched" our New and Updated RoadMap.  Please take a look here and share and like if you wish    https://medium.com/augmentors/augmentors-2018-roadmap-community-update-april-26th-2018-48343aff31f4  https://i.imgur.com/GsvhLtd.png  There are several important updates.   In Q3 Development you will see "Emerald System". Let me explain this further.  Emeralds will be the premium currency in the game, and linked to Databits at a fixed ratio (referred to as Databits Tethers or $DTBT in the whitepaper). Several people have asked "why $DTB can not be used" and quite simply App stores, Apple, Android do not allow Crypto Currency in game, so, as per the white paper V2 we have to create a system where $DTB will still be used (we want it to be the main Token for Augmentors Game) but we need this "Bridge" for the App stores.  People will be able to convert Emeralds into DTB They will want to do this as we will give a nice incentive for using $DTB over money purchases The majority of players will get emeralds as part of every pack they purchase  This is all i can mention for now, other than what is in the article above as all the fine details are still being worked out.  [/list]  The second part of the news is that we intend to make the Creature Tokens ERC721 . As you will be aware ERC is Ethereum and $DTB on BCT/Counterparty.   So we are also planning on how to merge the two and it could well be a case of having a token swap on Bittrex that would convert the $DTB into a ERC721 token also so both tokens are fully compatible.  So, as you can see our entire team is hard at work and we really dont stop, it is our pleasure to be working on such a exciting and big Blockchain Game and we intend to delivery the best possible game for mobiles devices.   Every step of the way we are thinking about the community and how we can best serve our community and future gamers with the best mobile, blockchain based game, the landscape is forever evolving and we will move with the times to ensure we have the most up to date foundation and developments on offer.  We are deeply grateful to all those who are with us and we look forward to seeing more come next Alpha testing in early Q3.  Please make sure to sign up on our official website.  https://www.augmentorsgame.com/  #Keepbattling

Author: Febo
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Soem news about how game will work came out last week    Hey guys!  In this week’s update I’ll be giving you insight into the current development of the game!  As discussed in our updated roadmap, we have incorporated a lot exciting new features off the back of the Token Holder Alpha feedback. This week, we would like to share what the team is currently working on, and give you some insight into the underlying mechanics.  Bello Realm Honor We are really excited to introduce a new concept called “honor”. We have designed honor to accommodate many different uses in the game, which are described below, including matching players with more suitable opponents.  Each player in the game will have honor — which indicates the skill level of that player. A player’s honor will increase after every battle won and decrease after every loss. This means that a player will be matched with other players of a similar skill level.  Leagues We will introduce eleven different leagues, ranging from Beginner all the way up to Platinum, each requiring a higher amount of honor than the previous.  When new players start the game, they will automatically start in the Beginner league, and will have to battle their way up.  Promotion and relegation Once you have gained enough honor you will automatically be promoted to a higher league, similarly, if you lose enough battles you will be relegated to a lower league.  Arenas As a reward for getting promoted, players will also unlock new Arenas in which they can battle. Each new Arena will have a higher entry fee, where the winning player takes all the fees.  Each arena will represent a different region in Bello Realm, and once you’ve unlocked an arena it will stay unlocked.  Seasons Seasons will run for a set period of time (we are still working on the exact season length) and at the end of that period, the leaderboards are reset. After every season, prizes proportionate to the league you’re in will be rewarded, and then all players’ honor will be reset to the minimum honor of their current leagues, and the battle begins again!  User Interface Update  Sky Point Mountains As you might have seen in the updated roadmap, we are well underway with an entire UI revamp.  We are currently updating all the screens; ranging from the main screen to the battle screen and we are sure certain players are going to love the updates! Watch this space for more updates.  Social  Amber Woods We are adding the ability to allow players to manage a friends list, allowing them to add and remove friends as they please. Players will then have the ability to challenge their friends directly whenever they are both online.  Last but not least, time for some small (but fun) stuff! Players will have a flag above their profile while they battle for dominance, showing which country they come from. Further to this, we have enabled a simple in-game chat, along with emoji’s, to share your experience with your opponent.

So please follow: https://medium.com/augmentors  A lot of people have been wondering about the scale of our game, on our website you will see a link to "Places" this gives a brief overview of the regions within the Bello Realm.   Please see:  https://www.augmentorsgame.com/prologue-places/  Back to developments and everything is running tight to schedule but on time, first impressions last and come soft launch we want to make sure everything is as perfect as can be, we have a very talented Team and very enthusiastic in high spirits, we are all excited and cautious as we are all fully aware of the huge importance of getting things right.   All we ask is the continued support from everyone who follows us and some understanding that developments take time and often work we had done previously has to be re-done when something new and more suitable is released for developing, which has happened on occasion.   Feedback from previous Alpha was really positive and we are continuing to develop  all suggestions. Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hey Guys!  There has been some discussion in our community channels this past week around our virtual economy, Databits (DTB) and how the in-game currencies will work. In this week’s update I’ll clarify these elements and hopefully answer all your questions.  If you haven’t done so already, please read the Databits Economy Design V2.1 before you continue to give you some background.  https://www.augmentorsgame.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/25052018-DatabitsWhitepaper-v2.1.pdf  We have updated this paper (from V2.0) to reflect the naming convention of the premium in game currency, Emeralds.  Databits (DTB) The Augmentors economy has been designed in such a way to align the interest of the Augmentors business, the backers, the players and all other participants in the network.    Emeralds is the premium currency in Augmentors, and is locked to DTB at a fixed ratio. Emeralds can be traded into and out of DTB. Augmentors will keep DTB in a reserve to maintain a fixed ratio of 1 DTB to 1000 Emeralds. So as the game gains popularity, the amount of DTB stored in the reserve will continue to grow due to increased number of Emeralds in circulation. This was done because using DTB directly in the game introduced technical, UI and regulatory issues.  Emeralds will be purchased through packs, but players may want to bring DTB directly into the game which they will be able to do. Players will also be able to take their Emeralds out of the game in the form of DTB.  Illustrative example (not indicative of the weighting of packs):  A player buys a $10 USD pack from the in-game store. In this pack, she receives two creatures, five relics, three skins, two spells and $4 USD worth of Emeralds. At the time, one DTB is worth one USD, so she receives 4000 Emeralds. The in-app store automatically transfers four DTB to the DTB reserve to maintain the DTB and Emeralds ratio. Through extensive playing, she gains another 1000 Emeralds. After levelling up one of her creatures, she decides that she wants to sell it and lists it on the auction house.  The creature is deemed valuable because it is rare (one of 100 ever made), and because she is skilled, it has never lost a battle. She sells this creature for 10,000 Emeralds.  She now decides to cash out her Emeralds. She logs onto the website and completes the required KYC and withdraws her 15,000 Emeralds. These are removed from circulation and the proportional amount of DTB — being 15 — is sent to her counterparty enabled wallet. She then decides to sell the 15 DTB on the secondary market and because the game is popular, the price of DTB has risen to $2 USD each. She sells these 15 DTB for $30 USD.  Currencies in the game “Most free to play games these days have opted for a multiple currency model for their economies. This all stems from the initial formula used with early free to play games that featured a dual currency system. One “Soft Currency” that players earn through gameplay and one “Hard Currency” that can only be purchased through an IAP. These days a lot of free to play games have more complex economies than this, but the principle remains the same: your players can play a lot for free and earn the Soft Currency, or trade money for time and acquire the more valuable “Hard” currency to speed up in game progression. This is by far the most popular model for free to play games, especially mobile free to play games.” — Gamesparks We have followed a similar model and will use Emeralds as the “Hard” currency (locked to DTB at a fixed ratio) and Gold as the “Soft” currency.  Emeralds (Premium currency locked to DTB at a fixed ratio) How do you get Emeralds?  Emeralds are the premium currency of Augmentors. Emeralds can be earned by purchasing packs of creatures, relics and other items for fiat (i.e. USD) in the game. Emeralds can also be gained by bringing your DTB into the game and as special rewards when playing.  What can you do with Emeralds?  Emeralds will be the currency used in the Auction House, the in-game marketplace, for creatures, relics and skins.  Emeralds will also be used to immediately open packs in the game and to buy Gold in the store.  The amount of Emeralds a player has accumulated will also reflect on their game profile as prestige, a cosmetic addition. This mechanism can be thought of as a staking mechanism to encourage players to hold Emeralds. This has been done to ensure the game remains fair and gamers cannot pay to win.  Emeralds can also be taken out of the game in exchange for DTB.  Gold How do you get Gold?  Gold is the secondary currency in Augmentors. Gold can be earned from winning matches, opening of packs and by trading for Emeralds.  What can you do with Gold?  Gold can be used to upgrade spells and to play in certain arenas.  I hope this post clarifies the in-game currencies and how Emeralds are locked to DTB. If you have any questions feel free to ask them below or in our social platforms.  For those who missed the Token Holder Alpha, make sure you sign up for Alpha today! https://www.augmentorsgame.com/  If you haven’t already, join us on our official Discord server, Telegram and Twitter!  KeepBattling! About Augmentors  Fore more information on Augmentors and to sign up for Alpha visit https://www.augmentorsgame.com/ , read the Databits Economy Design and join us on Telegram, Discord and Twitter.  Gaming Augmented Reality Blockchain Cryptocurrency Mobile Games    https://medium.com/augmentors/virtual-economy-databits-dtb-and-the-in-game-currencies-community-update-may-25th-2018-e260de00d5c4

Author: VintageBazaar
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Just organising some screenshots from the Alpha testing over the past few days. Some really amazing AR  (Augmented Reality) location pics.  So as promised here we go.... We had 5 creatures to choose from as seen in the Medium blog updates. Ki, Sha, Tiska, Markik and Tundris. All have their own special ability (Spell) along with all the usual Spells, which are selected  before battle in the "Card Deck" area. You arr able to customise 3 card decks, but only use one deck in battle, so if you find yourself being beaten, you can go back and choose a different card deck that will hopefully allow you to beat your opponent.  Alpha testing has been a huge success, the overall feedback has been very positive and the vibe during the weekend was "Buzzing" with excitement. Here are some of the photos taken from real locations around the world, from a Beach in South Africa, To woodlands in the heart of Europe to old World War Fortress in Belgium.  Taken by Gert Augmentors CEO while at the beach in South Africa.   Ki vs Markik.  This is really bright Summer Sun also.    Tundris VS Markik. Markik unleashing huge rock from a portal that opens up to drop on Tundris Head. Tundris reacting quickly with Glacier Shield to deflect shot. Players have a split second to see what the other person intends to do and react to it.      Markik has one of the most impressive AR spells, as shown here, when on a "earth"  real world "platform" the ground looks like it has opened up to reveal a volcanic surface below, picture does not do it justice as when playing you will look at the ground (away from phone screen) just to make sure it is not actually opening up and on fire!    The Developments team have gone to great detail, clear a lot of thought and dedication to detail has been made during the developments, this stands as testament to the quality of the game they are producing, and make no mistake about it Augmentors Game looks set to become a world wide success. Before Battle, your creature will Appear on screen via Portals, all portals have different designs, here we can see two portals appear a second or two before the creatures explode onto the screen.      So much more to come which will be shared on Social Media, Twitter, REddit and Facebook.  But i have to say, im saving my own personal favourite till last, again Markik this time unleashing his "Flaming Phoenix" attack, i tried to capture this shot ten times and was not able to, user "team Belgium" nailed it, im sure you will all agree.  Markik vs Ki, in a old WW2 Fortress, what a Epic Setting!      Please make sure to follow all social media accounts for Augmentors, links in my signature below.   Heres looking forward to a Huge Year for Augmentors Game.   Full game due Q4 2018.

Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hello Everyone,  What exciting times we live in.  Here at Augmentors HQ we have completed our greatest testing to date, Token Holder Alpha.  Spread over 4 fun filled days, the community members who sign up to our website and help some $DTB were able to participate, nearly all phone were able to try the non AR mode, so they could at least Battle and see all the Big Improvements we have made and others with newer phones were able to try out the AR mode and as we can see from the images above, there were some stunning locations. Some testers were able to live stream footage also drawing more attention to our game and current developments, a BIG THANK YOU to all who took part.  AR is still relatively new technology, the Augmented Reality developments world changes all of the time, thus, we could be working in "one direction" only to have some new tech, that allows us to do things better and take us in another direction.  The road to Full release is not a straight one and there will be times when we will have new ways to development the game, that were previously not possible.    So i hope all here can understand the reasons why developments take the time they do, first impressions last and we intend to make the Best first impression possible and we can proudly say, everything is looking great and coming along, at a rate we are happy with.  Please bookmark and view our weekly updates here: https://medium.com/augmentors  Speaking of "new ways" there is a recent development that is very big news for AR, previously not possible, was the ability to be able to let another user view your surroundings.   Example: Im having a Epic Battle with Vintage.  Vintage happens to be on holidays in Egypt and is standing in front of the Great Pyramids, with this new development in AR i would be able to battle and also see his location/background, in this example we would have a BAttle were the great pyramids were in the background.     With Augmentors Game we will have people worldwide playing, battling. Imagine how amazing it will be to experience the natural surrounds of the other player, this is a very exciting breakthrough.  Please read article here:  https://next.reality.news/news/startup-youar-demos-persistent-cross-platform-ar-experiences-via-arkit-arcore-0183975/  Take part in Alpha testing at the end of Q2. Please sign up on or website.  https://www.augmentorsgame.com/alpha-signup/   Many thanks and we look forward to seeing you next Alpha.

Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hello,  Augmented Reality will be more common across many mobile device in the next 4-12 months.  Like a lot of things, if you want to use the latest tech, you need a device that supports the latest tech (in the early days) until they release it for more wider devices.  The difference between AR and VR. Well, as quoted best by the Franklin institute.  "Augmented reality (AR) adds digital elements to a live view often by using the camera on a smartphone. Examples of augmented reality experiences include Snapchat lenses and the game Pokemon Go. Virtual reality (VR) implies a complete immersion experience that shuts out the physical world."  AR = Uses the world around you VR = Full Virtual World.  Both have huge benefits in the modern world.  The token that Augmentors Game uses is $DTB and this is available on Bittrex and full game launch is due approx October, November or December this year 2018.

Now, there is some Avengers type mask/helmet that allows you to insert your phones and view everything in a AR setting.  Marvel Hero Vision Iron Man AR:  https://www.engadget.com/2018/02/12/hasbro-iron-man-ar-helmet/  I could totally see something like this for Augmentors Game!  Surely the leap to allowing this set up with AR can not be too difficult to do.  Damn im very excited thinking about this.  Imagine.  Augmentors game mask you wear and (for now at least) you can put your phone inside helmet that allows you to view the battle in a  AR way.  You would then need to control the battle, if this could be done with some glove type device, boy, ooh boy! (like in the article above)  You would be able to free roam around the battle the beauty of AR means you can view the battle or the creatures from any angle also the controls are quote basic (compared to console or pc games) making it ideal for this type of set up.  Wow.  Im going to say it is very likely to be possible within 12 to 24 months from now.  Then we see kids and adults in homes, back gardens, playing fields, even shopping centers, wearing Augmentors Masks and having battles this way.  Combine this with motion control and its a double win.  I can just picture myself and my partner wearing Augmentors Masks, say, me, Tundris and as he is a wolf, id have a Wolf like Claw glove VS Markik whos have a claw like glow as he is a bird type figure.  Not only is this really exciting and really great idea, but i could see this being a very popular gift for Birthdays and Christmas.

But not only that, i found the fee the same as Bittrex and for anyone new getting into crypto, the process is so super easy, it is the ideal "bridge" for beginners to know how to buy crypto and then send to a wallet.   I tested about 5 transactions and all went through quickly from 15 to 30mins, only times it was slower was when "America" was awake.  You can sign up to coinswitch easily.  1. email address (can be any you like) 2. Phone number (can be any you like as its for sms verification, i used a online service for free to get the verification code) https://www.receive-sms-online.info/  (it is all in the video i made).  So overall really great service, a absolute shapeshift killer as , far as i am aware, shapeshift give you one exchange rate, Coinswitch is like a price comparison site also and will let you, the buyer chose the best deal.

Body: Hello Bitcoin Talk Community,  This weeks, weekly update is ready and has important information about the creature token swap.  https://medium.com/augmentors/augmentors-creature-tokens-creature-swap-community-update-february-16-2018-3f550532cfd9  The landscape is changing and changing fast, we can see that the counterparty chain is not best suited to our need so we will be making the change from XCP chain for Creature token distribution to the Ethereum ERC token  (we have yet to make final decision on which ERC token we will use). Body: I read the creatures will be distributed as ERC20 tokens  I know ERC20 is widely popular (better to tell - wildly fashionable nowadays), so my position here would not be too popular, but I will express is anyway: apparently Augmentors are moving from free, decentralized and secure Bitcoin chain to the less secure and not-decentarlized (Vitalik-centered) Ethereum... The BTC transaction spam is gone now, and BTC TX fees have dropped tremendously, so I am unsure of the reasons of the move. If the same kind of spam attack starts on ETH network, there will be the same problems as BTC had, so moving to ETH because of the low fees there doesn't seem to be a well thought decision.  Anyway, XCP or ERC20 - both will work moderately well, and nobody can know what will be the best in the long run, so back to my question:  are only creatures tokens transferred to be ERC20, or does the same refer to the DTB tokens too?

Author: VintageBazaar
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Regarding the above questions about other exchanges, i did answer this in two posts before there.  The main problem is simply this.  To get on Binance or Kucoin exchange now, most often you need to vote, they have this voting system, because you need to own the coins of the exchange.  EG: BNB  (Binance Token) or KuCoin Shares (Kucoin exchange token).  They are able to print these tokens out of fresh air and people then need to buy these tokens to vote, clever system right.  So these exchanges wont add new coins because they like the look of them (maybe at first not now) they have their system in place so people have to buy the exchange coins to then vote for a coin to be listed.  It is no problem to buy the tokens.  The problem here is we simply do not have a big enough community that would give us the votes we would require. You need around 700-1,000 people to vote for you to get on Binance or Kucoin (both decent exchanges that i use myself).  Not only that, we are currently on Bittrex and Volume and Buy support there is pretty thin, so no need to be on another exchange as there would be little volume or buy support, thats being honest.  OR  There are forms to contact the exchange directly to be added, but there has been some wild numbers flying around, like 90BTC to be listed on Binance, i will pass the Coin Request Forms onto Gert, the CEO for Augmentors Game and then will give response here, but most likely they will want a lot of money to be instantly added, money that can be much better spent on developing the game.  BUT.....    The Augmentors Game Community grows daily and every week at least one new member reaches out and asks how they can help, this is really great, once we have the community helping out, we can then be confident to get on the above exchanges via community voting.    So its a waiting game,  the New Alpha testing will bring a lot more people to the community, so everything possible is being done daily to grow our community.  We are extremely thankful to all who offer help and stand by us, its a great feeling and looknig forward to more people joining.

Author: VintageBazaar
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Good Day everyone, hope you all had a good Weekend.  Its all systems go here so another working weekend nailed.  A mini update from the Telegram group for those of you who dont follow there  (highly recomend that you do, Kyle of Michael do read message and are there now and then to answer questions).  So please post any question you have for the team here also, i will make sure they read and answer them.   This is form Telegram group this morning from Kyle one of the founders and lead developers.     (I asked what a Sprint was exactly)   So its basically a work flow process to make sure we are working efficiently and time bound. For example we need to cover 6 features in the next two weeks, we create a 2 week sprint and allocate time to each task and we will do a review after the 2 weeks  (then i asked about the features the team are working on)   Yeah so some of the features we are planning through today will be:  -Skills Tree - Card Levelling - Relics - A lot of work around creature, VFX , Animation etc  So a bit more of a insight into the daily developments of the team. With all developments there are many stages to the process, you have your planning, your brainstorming and then hands on coding, working out what works, what does not work and what needs to work, so you can see how the time is filled and most likely, not enough hours in the day.  Link to telegram group is in my signature and as always be safe here and online, so only trust links i or official team members post.

Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hello Bitcoin Talk members.  As Vintage pointed out above, please follow our Medium Blog, it is where we post our weekly updates along with telegram and you can find the link to these and more on our twitter and Reddit page.  This week we introduce a new member to our growing Team.     Welcome Marianna I’d like to introduce you all to our newest team member, Marianna! Marianna is a marketer by trade (backed by a Marketing degree) who joins us all the way from Greece. She will support Augmentors in community management and growth (along with our crypto community liaison Simon, aka Vintage Bazaar), and a host of other marketing areas. She’s worked in numerous countries and industries, including gaming (of course), and is fluent in English, Italian and Greek so feel free to chat to her on Telegram in any of these languages. She is also learning Japanese and knows how tough it is! Her motto is 悔しい (Kuyashii — use the words of doubters as energy to succeed or simply prove them wrong). The reason why you haven’t seen her on our Augmentors Team page yet is because she still needs to choose her favourite Augmentor to join her on screen. If you have any suggestions do let her know.  We do have all areas covered and we will do have a ongoing marketing strategy that is going to gather pace as we get closer to full game launch, so please bear with us, we are in good hands and  we want to make sure all efforts and time spent on marketing and developing the game are used in the best possible way.  Everything we do, we do with a future vision and great thought about how it will impact the full game release and also going forward.  Please continue to read the update here on our Medium Blog.  https://medium.com/augmentors/creature-mechanics-and-a-new-team-member-community-update-february-2-2018-42fe50310e3a  Thank you all.

Author: VintageBazaar
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: So, First  "Is there any work for listing on other exchanges ?"    Simply No, not right now, Bittrex is the No.1 altcoin exchange, so DTB perfectly fine here.   There is no better exchange than Bittrex, thats why it is the most popular and most trusted.   Poloniex is very much out of favour with traders and to be honest, not to be trusted, i was trading there for 4 years until last April, when something really "fishy" happened to a couple of big margin trades i had, long story short, i close them when they should of been in very good profits and my balances had less btc (i know how to margin trade also).  Ideally $DTB needs to be on a popular Chinese , Korean exchange.  This often requires community voting and considering, very few people can be bothered to do something as simple as a retweet, then there is little chance of getting  community voting on a exchange right now, community needs to understand, the big coins get to where they are because they have really strong community support, its a simple as that.   Posted 2 days ago: From Official Augmentors Game channel on Twitter.  https://twitter.com/AugmentorsGame/status/951786811856228352  Stats: 1 Retweet....        ............................................................................... ................   So some of these cards, or characters were sold along side the presale of DTB?  Correct, there are a limited creation of ICO creatures.  Founds here on website > https://www.augmentorsgame.com/creatures/ People who bought into the ICO where given DTB and 1 creature token.  The token will be swapped end of Q1 for one of the rare ICO creatures, other creatures wont be limited like the starting creatures but these ICO creature will never be reproduced.  I think these stats are up to date:  Rookie - 263 Champion - 92 Ultimate - 120 Hero/ Villain- 85 God - 51  As you can see, should/when this game goes viral and has hundreds of thousands of players, even millions, all who want to own the rare ICO creatures, you can see the demand there will be for them.   ............................................................................... ..................  Will there be a mechanism for DTBT outside of the app? Will it be traded on exchanges?   No,  (it wont be called Tether either, thats just  a "place holding tag")  It only serves for in game, as DTB has big value there has to be "tether" that can act as tiny pieces of DTB basically, then people can "cash-in" this dtbT for the real deal $DTB.  All explained here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXe9qp1e4ws  ............................................................................... ................  Lastly when will this discord for testers be launched? Is it available now? Yes, its available now and has been since the very first pre alpha testing way back in May.  It will be open to people who get to test the game (for now) and later on it will be made public for full game release.  Discord is the No.1 place for Gamers to untie and chat and talk about games, so a perfect place for Augmentors gaming community.  IF people here have not done so already, please sign up on the official website for alpha testing.  https://www.augmentorsgame.com/  Front page, half way down. Enter your email address and you will be notified as son as next alpha testing begins, you will need to act fast with the emails.  ............................................................................... ........  Many thanks for your Questions, all i ask, it that the community can take a few moments now and then each week to try and help Augmentors Game awareness, there is a big marketing strategy planned which will be revealed closer to full game launch, in the mean time all i ask (beg) for, is you guys can spare a few moments, to give likes, retweets (twitter) maybe write a a blog post or make a video like a community member done here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khZgwJrUcTQ   Thank you.

Author: MichaelDeon
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Hello Community,  Firstly, thank you for posting the images of the upcoming pre alpha testing, as i only have a newbie account i cant add images.    A couple of updates.  The OP here has been updated to include fresh and up to date information, people are now able to easily view white paper, head over to our new website, that is packed with information about our Augmented Reality Battle game and at the bottom of the OP is the link to our Blog posts on Medium.  The medium blog post is updated every week, so please make sure to bookmark and read, thank you.  https://medium.com/augmentors  We have been working incredibly hard since the ICO ended successfully at the end of February this year, we had a target of $1m USD which we reached, due to having carefully and thoughtfully budgets for the full game development , we sold the Bitcoin once all DTB ICO investors had been paid out. So we did miss the big Bitcoin price rise, but no one knew that Bitcoin would reach all time highs like this and it would not have been responsible for us to hold the bitcoin and risk our developments, we hope you understand.  Next, we are gearing up for Pre Alpha testing, this is initially open to the ICO backers as stated previously. We must stress, this is pre alpha testing, the very first testing stages of our new design.  A lot has changed in the AR world over the last few months, Apple iOS were first with their ARKit which gave us more options when developing the game, now quite recently Android have released ARCore so we have are able to develop and create a game with many more options that we had before.    So i hope people understand, that the compatible phones for android are limited due to the kit being so fresh.  FEEDBACK: Feedback is very important to us, we have had a lot of feedback already from our previous screenshot and we can see that there are improvements to be made. We listen to all feedback, we always read posts, here on Bitcoin Talk, twitter, you tube comments and our active Telegram group.  I will be personally posting more, we have been so busy with game development and making sure Pre Alpha testing was ready by the end of the year, every moment has been fully focused on the game developments, so not long to wait now.  Thank you all for your continued support and faith in our project and team  (oh speaking of such, have you seen the new team profiles on our new website?) https://www.augmentorsgame.com/meet-the-augmentors-team/  We have a long journey ahead of us, Full game release is scheduled for Q4 2018.  Our team is passionate and talented and we wont settle for anything less than the Best Augmented Reality game.  Keep Battling!

Author: VintageBazaar
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: Taken from Medium, Augmentors Game Blog.  https://medium.com/augmentors/augmentors-month-end-community-update-october-27-2017-54f71a318cf3    Gert KrugerFollow CEO Augmentors Oct 27  Augmentors month end community update — October 27 2017  Hi everyone,  Today’s community update includes some details of the new game mechanic, an introduction to our newest team member, website information, a crypto meetup and last but not least… the launch of a community competition where you may be the lucky community member to name the next Augmentors creature!  Gameplay A number of community members have asked about the game mechanics and how it has changed. Although this will still be refined in the coming months, I’d like to share a high level overview. Before I dive into the new mechanic, some background on the old mechanic. Although the game was well received in the first pre-alpha, we received some great feedback about the turn based dice mechanic that led us to review the game mechanic. The main problem with the turn based dice mechanic was that players would spend a lot of time waiting for the other player which slowed down the game. The mechanic also meant that it was difficult to add a lot of depth to the game. After many iterations over the past two months, we have landed on a strategic real time game mechanic.  Spells and abilities will be represented as cards. Players will be able to add spells and abilities to their creatures over time, and be able to choose a subset of cards before going into battle (similar to deck building in other games). At the start of each match, both players will receive a hand of randomly drawn cards. Each card has a mana cost associated with it. At the start of the match both players will have the same amount of mana, and during the match mana will be produced at a constant rate. When a card gets used a new one will randomly be drawn. This allows players to play their cards at any time removing the delays necessary in a turn based game. The new game mechanic will offer more depth, as players have access to endless (well almost endless) combinations and strategies. It will also allow Augmentors to keep releasing new spells and abilities over time, ensuring that the game stays fresh and interesting. We will keep you posted over the coming months as the new game mechanic is refined.  New team member I am happy to share that we have a new developer, Stefan, joining the team in November 2017. Stefan has a lot of game development experience, and is a welcome addition to the team. As you know we have a lot of big plans, and cannot wait for him to get cracking.  Website The new gamer focussed website was very well received and thank you to all of you for the excellent feedback for future iterations. We’ll do a website update in the next few weeks and include team bios (as many of you requested). I have also heard that the community is working on a “Beginners guide to buying DTB”, if this is complete it would be great to add it to the website with the next update.  Competition — Name the next Augmentors creature and win! Now onto something very exciting, the community competition! We would like to take you all on the journey of creating a new creature. This journey will last 3 weeks and culminate in someone from the community naming the next creature, winning a 3D printed model of the creature and a digital in game token of the creature! Runner up prizes also up for grabs!  3D Model of Anta We will share progress updates like artwork and models during the development of the creature. We kicked off the competition creature journey this week with the first sketches below. As you can it’s already taking shape.  Character development While we share progress updates over the coming weeks you’ll need to get those creative juices flowing. After the 3D model has been shared on November 10 the competition will officially open allowing you to submit the best creature names of all time! The Augmentors team will then choose a shortlist that goes back to the community for a final vote of the winning name! The competition timings:  Competition timings Competition prizes: Winner: Awesome 3D printed model of the new creature. Digital in game creature token (token will be sent to the wallet address of the winner provided during entry). Second prize: An A1 printed poster of Augmentors artwork. An Augmentors branded T-shirt. Third prize: An Augmentors branded T-shirt. Rules: Only Databit (DTB) holders can take part in this competition. Each Databit (DTB) holder can submit a maximum of 5 new creature names. Submission details will include your name, wallet address and entry names. The Augmentors shortlist will be the final shortlist that goes to a vote. Voting will be limited to community members who have entered the competition and be weighted based on Databit (DTB) ownership. The creature name with the most votes wins. If the winning creature name was submitted by multiple participants, the first entry will win.  Crypto meetup  I would like to mention the Crypto meetup organised by one of our community members cr-mn taking place today. You can find more information here. Veel dank cr-mn! Wij waarderen de steun! Thank you very much to Simon for organising some Augmentors t-shirts for the event. Lastly, I would like to end by thanking all of the community members for their support. I realise it is a long time from the token sale to game release, and thank you all for your patience! This community is vital to our success, and we will support and grow it over the coming months.  Keep battling

Author: VintageBazaar
Title: AUGMENTORS GAME Augmented Reality Mobile Gaming iOS Android Token DTB Databits
Body: I am in direct contact with the Augmentors Team, more so the people higher up (so to speak) the game developers, are fully engaged in creating the game.  I have been very vocal (to the point they probably are sick of me already, but if i am having to message them so much, then clearly something needs done) about the importance of $DTB and the volume and buy support.  I think my words have been listened to and the team are now fully aware of the importance of being "Healthy" on Bittrex.  Ive also stressed how important it is for databits to always remain on the worlds No.1 altcoin exchange, Bittrex.      At this moment in time it is a mexican stand off.  No one is willing to buy dtb with bitcoin  with BTC in  full Bull mode, other people are happy to have Bitcoin sitting in BTC for the BTC gold freebie and others are simply to afraid to put bitcoin as buy support.   I was asked "How can we help improve this" (bittrex situation) and i simply put it to them, buy support = trust.  So clearly there is a lot of work to be done here, to gain peoples trust. There is a hell of a lot more that also needs to be done still on the social front.  And what makes me want to bang my head of my desk daily, i know, as i have seen it first hand, theirs a whole "Treasure Chest" of amazing updates they could give....  but the powers that be, are very "picky" and unwilling to release much info at this moment in time,  they seem to be under the impression it is best to leave most of the news for when game is fully launched then make a big push on the promotion side.  So we shall see, but i am really frustrated that after countless times explaining and wanting the team to be more active, i am yet again having to try to get them to understand.   I am doing all i can every day, 7 days a week...  i expect some extra support from the team   One thing is  for sure, if this was my start up, id be making sure people put in the "extra mile" and effort and made sure everything was on point and nothing was left "wanting".   There is NO EXCUSE for team members to so silent on the social front, a lot more effort (and how easy it is to make a FB post, tweet and such) is needed.  In regards to current developments, hopefully we will see new website this week (it is being done by a 3rd party, so out of the Augmentors Teams hands) Then we should see a white paper before Pre Alpha is released for testing, to supporters of the project, some point in Nov  (lets say end of Nov).
